title: Shenmi Shijie Lixian Ji 2 (Yugo & Lala 2)
synopsis: Yugo has been repeatedly telling her father a bedtime story that she was the only human visitor to a fantastical kingdom in the clouds where she befriended two animals, Lala and Uncle Bear. The three fought the evil Tiger General, who had risen up against the kingdom's ruler. It was the former ruler's dying wish that Lala would replace him. Missing her friends, Yugo finds her way back to the fantastical kingdom where she finds a disheartened Uncle Bear. He is sad that Lala is leaving him to move into the palace. However, Lala is unsure if she is the right one to rule the kingdom.
related_anime: ['Shenmi Shijie Lixian Ji', 'Shenmi Shijie Lixian Ji 3']
